name: Lying Tears
description:
This Game is made for the Cactus Game Jam. 

The project is a bit psychedelic, as it visualizes a Russian aphorism about mice and a cactus from the perspective of a cactus.

"The mice cried, got hurt, but continued to eat The Cactus."
- Russian aphorism

Work time: 6-8 hours.  Controls: [Space] - action, [Esc] - exit

Feel free to comment or share this game. Donate, If you want to support me.
